title: Can you see if someone is online on Discord? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can tell if someone is online on Discord by looking at their status indicator (small coloured dot next to avatar). By default, if someone is online, the dot will be green. Over a certain period of inactivity, the dot will automatically turn into a yellow crescent. Keep in mind, however, that users can also manually choose this status. A red dot symbolises Do Not Disturb. Chances are, the user is on Discord but is mainly inactive. Do Not Disturb turns off any notifications from Discord. Users can also set their status to invisible, meaning that they are still online but appear offline. In this case, you can’t really tell if they are online or not, hence the term “invisible”.

Yes, by the usual green identification(as up-to-date now) to see if another user is on. However, if you are referring to terms of when they are Offline(or just pretending to be, besides being Idle or Do Not Disturb), there is no way of knowing if they are. That’s why the feature is there. Though, most do tend to find out if they are if you message them and if they respond back in short time.

You can see if someone is online on discord by looking at their online status. if the person turn off online status then you can see the person is online or not. Users have a privacy option, they set their status according to their privacy. Users can also set their status to invisible, which means they are still online but appear offline.  Know More information about Discord Bots:

You can tell if someone is online by their mini status circle on their profile picture. Green - They are online and they will get notifications if they get pinged or if someone DM’s them or just texting in a server. Yellow - They are not here they have discord opened but they are not using it. Red - They are here but they just won’t get notifications if someone pings, DM’s or texting in a server. Gray - They are offline they don’t have discord open and they won’t get any notifications.
You can know by their mini status on their profile
